name: Intent to Implementation Workflow
description: Convert high-level intents into actionable implementation plans using workflow orchestration

steps.title: Capture Intent
steps.description: Document the high-level intent and gather context
actions: Clearly articulate the intent or goal
Identify the actor who will execute the plan
Gather relevant context (task IDs, domain info, etc.)

steps.title: Orchestrate Implementation Plan
steps.description: Use icn_workflow tool to generate comprehensive plan
actions: Call icn_workflow with the documented intent
Include actor and constraints in the request

steps.title: Review Orchestration Outputs
steps.description: Analyze the results from each orchestrated tool

steps.title: Refine Implementation Plan
steps.description: Enhance the orchestrated plan with specific details
actions: Break down high-level steps into specific tasks
Set realistic timelines based on complexity
Define success metrics and validation points

steps.title: Execute Implementation
actions: Implement changes according to architecture guidance
